snippet.title: Don't Touch My Phone - Gameplay 00
snippet.description:
Play On Steam :
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2729710

Tony, a six-year-old boy, has a crush on a girl his age named Susan. Unfortunately, Tony doesn't have a phone to text his girlfriend. In each level, he must sneak into someone else's phone, which is protected with nuke and heavy weapons, risking his life to reach her.
